General.Name: Ophir Gold Corp
General.Description: Ophir Gold Corp. engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral property assets in the United States. The company explores for precious and base metal deposits. It primarily has an option to acquire a 100% interest in the Breccia Gold property located in Lemhi County, Idaho. The company was formerly known as MinKap Resources Inc. and changed its name to Ophir Gold Corp. in October 2020. Ophir Gold Corp. was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 595 Howe Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2T5

2.Name: Mr. Darren L. Smith M.Sc, M.Sc., P.Geo., P.Geol.
